name: IISWebAppDeployment
description: Deploy Web Application using MSDeploy to IIS Web Site
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: EnvironmentName
inputs.label: Machine Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Machine Group for deploying the database.

inputs.name: ResourceFilteringMethod
inputs.label: Select Machines By
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a subset of machines either by providing machine names or tags.

inputs.name: MachineFilter
inputs.label: Deploy to Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a list of machines like dbserver.fabrikam.com, dbserver_int.fabrikam.com, 192.168.12.34 or tags like Role:DB;OS:Win8.1. Returns machines with either of the tags. For Azure Resource Group provide the VM Host Name for the machine name. The default is all machines in the machine group.

inputs.name: WebDeployPackage
inputs.label: Web Deploy Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the MSDeploy zip file on the target machines or on a UNC path like \BudgetIT\Web\Deploy\WebDeployPackage.zip

inputs.name: WebDeployParamFile
inputs.label: Web Deploy Parameters File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Parameters file to override any specific configuration settings

inputs.name: OverRideParams
inputs.label: Override Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Any specific parameters to be overridden in parameters file

inputs.name: WebSiteName
inputs.label: Site Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Web Site Name to be deployed

inputs.name: AppPoolName
inputs.label: Existing AppPool Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Application Pool for the web site

inputs.name: WebSitePhysicalPath
inputs.label: Physical Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Physical path of the web site

inputs.name: WebSitePhysicalPathAuth
inputs.label: Physical Path Authentication
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authentication mechanism for accessing the physical path of web site

inputs.name: WebSiteAuthUserName
inputs.label: User Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: User name for accessing web site physical path

inputs.name: WebSiteAuthUserPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for accessing web site physical path

inputs.name: AddBinding
inputs.label: Add Binding
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose to specify port binding information

inputs.name: Protocol
inputs.label: Protocol
inputs.helpMarkDown: Protocol for web site

inputs.name: IPAddress
inputs.label: IP Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: IP Address information for binding

inputs.name: Port
inputs.label: Port
inputs.helpMarkDown: Port information for binding

inputs.name: HostName
inputs.label: Host Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Port information for binding

inputs.name: ServerNameIndication
inputs.label: Server Name Indication Required
inputs.helpMarkDown: Server Name Indication Required

inputs.name: SSLCertThumbPrint
inputs.label: SSL Certificate Thumb Print
inputs.helpMarkDown: Web Site SSL Certificate Thumb Print

inputs.name: AppCmdArgs
inputs.label: Additional Appcmd.exe Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments for Appcmd.exe command line

inputs.name: DeployInParallel
inputs.label: Deploy in Parallel
